title: Coordinating Conjunctions
content: I wanted to go, [but|so] I was too tired.

title: Coordinating Conjunctions
content: It was raining, [so|because] we stayed inside.

title: Subordinating Conjunctions
content: I will call you [when|during] I arrive.
explanationEnUs: 'When' is used for a specific time or event.

title: Subordinating Conjunctions
content: She studied hard [although|but] she was sick.

title: Subordinating Conjunctions
content: We went out [because|so] the weather was nice.

title: Correlative Conjunctions
content: He acts [as if|as] he knows everything.
explanationEnUs: 'As if' describes a manner or pretense.
explanationZhTw: 'As if' (彷彿) 描述方式或假裝。
explanationZhCn: 'As if' (仿佛) 描述方式或假装。

title: Subordinating Conjunctions
content: You can't go [unless|if] you finish your homework.

title: Subordinating Conjunctions
content: [While|During] I was sleeping, the phone rang.
explanationEnUs: Use 'While' with a clause (subject + verb). 'During' takes a noun.

title: Coordinating Conjunctions
content: I like apples, [and|or] I also like oranges.

title: Subordinating Conjunctions
content: [Since|For] it is late, let's go home.
explanationZhTw: 這裡的 'Since' 意指「既然/因為」。
explanationZhCn: 这里的 'Since' 意指「既然/因为」。

title: Conjunctions
content: I like him, [even though|despite] he is annoying.
explanationEnUs: 'Even though' is followed by a clause. 'Despite' takes a noun/gerund.
explanationZhTw: 'Even though' 後接子句；'Despite' 接名詞/動名詞。
explanationZhCn: 'Even though' 后接子句；'Despite' 接名词/动名词。
